titleStmt.title: A discourse about church-unity being a defence of Dr. Stillingfleet's unreasonableness of separation, in answer to several late pamphlets, but principally to Dr. Owen and Mr. Baxter / by a presbyter of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
